Day 04 : Jan 29, 2015

Today we covered

The weird quirks of CSS

  • Display elements: block, inline-block, and inline
  • MDN’s display documentation
  • Common patterns in HTML CodePens
    • Number of Students ‘flexible’ Bar Graph
    • Why a simple ‘clearfix’ div doesn’t always fix it
    • Article and Aside layout using Display
    • Centering a group of divs as section
    • Three fixed (pixel-based) divs in a row
    • Three flexible (percent-based) divs in a row

Computer Setup

We did this:

  • Download iTerm
  • Install Command Tile Tools (without xCode!: code-select —install)
  • Install Oh My Zsh

On Monday, we’ll do this:

  • Install Homebrew
  • Generate SSH Keys in Github
  • Install Sass
  • Install Bourbon

Homework

Everyday a bit of written, audio, or video resources will be assigned to review, which will supplement class assignments. Assignments are always due by 8:59am of the following day, unless noted. Thursday homework is usually due Monday morning, unless noted otherwise.
